snippet: Doreen Garnsey was severely challenged by her own health problems, those of her father, troubled finances and her son’s problems with bullies at school — but found some help.
abstract: Catholic Big Sisters and Big Brothers, affiliate of Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, helps Doreen Garnsey of the Bronx buy laptop computer and flash drive for her son Edwyn, to help him with homework.
lead_paragraph: Doreen Garnsey was severely challenged by her own health problems, those of her father, troubled finances and her son’s problems with bullies at school — but found some help.

headline.print_headline: A Mentor, and a Laptop, Help Turn Things Around
headline.main: A Mentor, and a Laptop, Help Turn Things Around
